Medulla of WHS11.EditorialNote: The current version exlcudes part of what looks to be the dorsal cochlear nucleus;  looks like this needs review
Medulla of WHS11.Definition: Delineation of medulla in the Waxholm mouse brain atlas, as seen in T1 and T2* weighted volumes.  Defined as area ventral to the cerebellum, and by a fiat caudal boundary with spinal cord and a fiat rostral boundary with pons.
